mapper.select:
select count(m.id) from V7_RESULTS m
1=1
and m.v7_r_mnum like '%${v7RNum}%'
and m.v7_r_name like '%${v7RName}%'
and m.v7_r_month = #{v7RMonth}

update.foreach: update V7_RESULTS r set r.v7_r_bus_results = '${item.v7RBusResults}', r.v7_r_raise_results = '${item.v7RRaiseResults}', r.v7_r_out_results = '${item.v7ROutResults}', r.v7_r_trans_results = '${item.v7RTransResults}', r.v7_r_blowwash = '${item.v7RBlowwash}', r.v7_r_blowcutwash = '${item.v7RBlowcutwash}' where r.id = '${item.id}'

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM V7_RESULTS r where r.v7_r_month = #{value}

SELECT r.v7_r_month, r.v7_r_eid, r.v7_r_mnum, r.v7_r_name, r.v7_r_position, COALESCE(SUM(r.v7_r_bus_results), 0) v7_r_bus_results, COALESCE(SUM(r.v7_r_raise_results), 0) v7_r_raise_results, COALESCE(SUM(r.v7_r_out_results), 0) v7_r_out_results, COALESCE(SUM(r.v7_r_trans_results), 0) v7_r_trans_results, COALESCE(SUM(r.v7_r_blowwash), 0) v7_r_blowwash, COALESCE(SUM(r.v7_r_blowcutwash), 0) v7_r_blowcutwash FROM V7_RESULTS r WHERE r.v7_r_month = #{value} GROUP BY r.v7_r_eid ;
mapper.sql: id, v7_r_month, v7_r_eid, v7_r_mnum, v7_r_name, v7_r_position, v7_r_bus_results, v7_r_raise_results, v7_r_out_results, v7_r_trans_results, v7_r_blowwash, v7_r_blowcutwash, extends1, extends2, extends3, extends4, extends5
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from V7_RESULTS
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into V7_RESULTS (id, v7_r_month, v7_r_eid, v7_r_mnum, v7_r_name, v7_r_position, v7_r_bus_results, v7_r_raise_results, v7_r_out_results, v7_r_trans_results, v7_r_blowwash, v7_r_blowcutwash, extends1, extends2, extends3, extends4, extends5) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{v7RMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{v7REid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{v7RMnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{v7RName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{v7RPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{v7RBusResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{v7RRaiseResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{v7ROutResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{v7RTransResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{v7RBlowwash,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{v7RBlowcutwash,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{extends1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extends2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extends3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extends4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extends5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into V7_RESULTS
id,
v7_r_month,
v7_r_eid,
v7_r_mnum,
v7_r_name,
v7_r_position,
v7_r_bus_results,
v7_r_raise_results,
v7_r_out_results,
v7_r_trans_results,
v7_r_blowwash,
v7_r_blowcutwash,
extends1,
extends2,
extends3,
extends4,
extends5,

mapper.update:
update V7_RESULTS
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v7_r_month = #{record.v7RMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v7_r_eid = #{record.v7REid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v7_r_mnum = #{record.v7RMnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
v7_r_name = #{record.v7RName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v7_r_position = #{record.v7RPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v7_r_bus_results = #{record.v7RBusResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
v7_r_raise_results = #{record.v7RRaiseResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
v7_r_out_results = #{record.v7ROutResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
v7_r_trans_results = #{record.v7RTransResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
v7_r_blowwash = #{record.v7RBlowwash,jdbcType=INTEGER},
v7_r_blowcutwash = #{record.v7RBlowcutwash,jdbcType=INTEGER},
extends1 = #{record.extends1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extends2 = #{record.extends2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extends3 = #{record.extends3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extends4 = #{record.extends4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extends5 = #{record.extends5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update V7_RESULTS set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v7_r_month = #{record.v7RMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v7_r_eid = #{record.v7REid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v7_r_mnum = #{record.v7RMnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v7_r_name = #{record.v7RName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v7_r_position = #{record.v7RPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v7_r_bus_results = #{record.v7RBusResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, v7_r_raise_results = #{record.v7RRaiseResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, v7_r_out_results = #{record.v7ROutResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, v7_r_trans_results = #{record.v7RTransResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, v7_r_blowwash = #{record.v7RBlowwash,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v7_r_blowcutwash = #{record.v7RBlowcutwash,jdbcType=INTEGER}, extends1 = #{record.extends1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extends2 = #{record.extends2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extends3 = #{record.extends3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extends4 = #{record.extends4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extends5 = #{record.extends5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update V7_RESULTS
v7_r_month = #{v7RMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v7_r_eid = #{v7REid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v7_r_mnum = #{v7RMnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
v7_r_name = #{v7RName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

v7_r_bus_results = #{v7RBusResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
v7_r_raise_results = #{v7RRaiseResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
v7_r_out_results = #{v7ROutResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
v7_r_trans_results = #{v7RTransResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
v7_r_blowwash = #{v7RBlowwash,jdbcType=INTEGER},

extends1 = #{extends1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

extends5 = #{extends5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update V7_RESULTS set v7_r_month = #{v7RMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v7_r_eid = #{v7REid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v7_r_mnum = #{v7RMnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v7_r_name = #{v7RName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v7_r_position = #{v7RPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v7_r_bus_results = #{v7RBusResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, v7_r_raise_results = #{v7RRaiseResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, v7_r_out_results = #{v7ROutResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, v7_r_trans_results = #{v7RTransResults,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, v7_r_blowwash = #{v7RBlowwash,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v7_r_blowcutwash = #{v7RBlowcutwash,jdbcType=INTEGER}, extends1 = #{extends1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extends2 = #{extends2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extends3 = #{extends3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extends4 = #{extends4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extends5 = #{extends5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
